Name: Brain Correlates of Math Development
HowToAcknowledge:
Please cite: 
Suarez-Pellicioni M, Lytle M, Younger JW, Booth JR. (2019). A longitudinal neuroimaging dataset on arithmetic processing in 8- to 16-year old children. Scientific Data. volume 6, Article number: 190040
Funding: This research was supported by HD059177 and HD093547 from the National Institute of Child Health and Human Development to James R. Booth.
